resources.string:
==Discovery== **Discovered by:** William Herschel
 **Discovery date:** March 13, 1781
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 2,877 million km (19.2 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.0444
 **Orbital period:** 84.3 years
 **Average orbital speed:** 6.81 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 0.773°
 **Satellites:** 27
==Physical characteristics== **Equatorial radius:** 25,559 km (4.01 Earths)
 **Flattening:** 0.0229
 **Volume:** 6.833×10^^13^^ km³ (63.1 Earths)
 **Mass:** 8.681×10^^25^^ kg (14.5 Earths)
 **Mean density:** 1.27 g/cm³
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 8.69 m/s² (0.886 g)
 **Escape velocity:** 21.3 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** 17h 14m 24s
 **Equatorial rotation velocity:** 9,320 km/h
 **Axial tilt:** 97.77°
 **Bond albedo:** 0.300
 **Surface temp** (1 bar level)**:** 76K
==Atmosphere== **Scale height:** 27.7 km
 **Composition** (below 1.3 bar)**:**
 83 ± 3% hydrogen (H,,2,,)
 15 ± 3% helium
 2.3% methane
 ~0.009% hydrogen deuteride (HD)
 **Ices:**
 ammonia, water, ammonium hydrosulfide (NH,,4,,SH), methane (CH,,4,,)


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uranus|wikipedia]].
